name: get-disabled-or-inactive-user-accounts
title: Get disabled or inactive user accounts
shortDescription: Find the user accounts which have been disabled or are inactive, export report to CSV
longDescription: In order to keep your tenant clean (Governance), you might want to ensure that disabled or inactive user accounts will be replaced where oppropriate (Think Owners of sites/groups, assignedto user on tasks/planner and so on). This script will help you find those accounts.

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample Get disabled or inactive user accounts

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
